scripts.build: xcrun --toolchain swiftwasm swift build --package-path ./src/MetalLibraryArchiveParser --triple wasm32-unknown-wasi -c release -Xlinker --export=parseMetalLib && wasm-strip ./src/MetalLibraryArchiveParser/.build/release/MetalLibraryArchiveParser.wasm && wasm-opt -Os ./src/MetalLibraryArchiveParser/.build/release/MetalLibraryArchiveParser.wasm -o ./src/MetalLibraryArchiveParser/.build/release/MetalLibraryArchiveParser.wasm && webpack
